חָ֤זוּ <S%H2372><s%> Cha-zu They have seen שָׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> shaV vanity וְקֶ֣סֶם <S%H7081><s%> ve-Ke-sem divination כָּזָ֔ב <S%H3577><s%> ka-Zav, and lying הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> ha-'o-me-Rim saying נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, The LORD וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo has not שְׁלָחָ֑ם <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cham; hath not sent וְיִֽחֲל֖וּ <S%H3176><s%> ve-yi-cha-Lu them and they have made [others] to hope לְקַיֵּ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> le-kai-Yem that they would confirm דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. the word

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not מַֽחֲזֵה־ <S%H4236><s%> ma-cha-zeh- vision שָׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> shaV a vain חֲזִיתֶ֔ם <S%H2372><s%> cha-zi-Tem, Have ye not seen וּמִקְסַ֥ם <S%H4738><s%> u-mik-Sam divination כָּזָ֖ב <S%H3577><s%> ka-Zav a lying אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H1696><s%> 'a-mar-Tem; and have ye not spoken וְאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'o-me-Rim whereas ye say נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, The LORD וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not דִבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti. answer ס sa-Mek

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah will have יָדִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di, And mine hand אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- will be against הַנְּבִיאִ֞ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im shall be upon the prophets הַחֹזִ֣ים <S%H2374><s%> ha-cho-Zim that see שָׁוְא֮ <S%H7723><s%> shaV vanity וְהַקֹּסְמִ֣ים <S%H7080><s%> ve-hak-ko-se-Mim and that divine כָּזָב֒ <S%H3577><s%> ka-Zav lies בְּס֧וֹד <S%H5475><s%> be-Sod they shall not be in the assembly עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi of my people לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no יִהְי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu, place וּבִכְתָ֤ב <S%H3791><s%> u-vich-Tav in the writing בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <S%H3789><s%> yik-ka-Te-vu, neither shall they be written וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- will be against אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יָבֹ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u; neither shall they enter וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh.
